snippet: Jim Lehrer and Robert MacNeil said they were talking with the Washington public television station WETA, the program’s co-producer, about taking over ownership of “PBS NewsHour.”
abstract: Jim Lehrer and Robert MacNeil, owners and ex-anchors of PBS NewsHour, say they are talking with Washington public television station WETA, program’s co-producer, about taking over ownership of show.
lead_paragraph: Jim Lehrer and Robert MacNeil said they were talking with the Washington public television station WETA, the program’s co-producer, about taking over ownership of “PBS NewsHour.”
